entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning early this evening then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
